status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this problem, expressed as a string value.

title.description: a short, human-readable summary of the problem that SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

parameters.description: Inclusion of related resources using `include=type`. Multiple relationships can be specified by comma-separating them `include=type1,type2`. A server may choose to expose a deeply nested relationship such as `include=type1.type2.type3`.
parameters.name: include

parameters.description: Sparse fieldsets. Specify fields for each resource type using `fields[type]=field1,field2`. An empty value indicates that no fields should be returned.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: Sorting of resources using `sort=field1,-field2`. A leading `-` indicates descending order.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Pagination parameters. Supports various pagination strategies.
parameters.name: page
